Max Level Codes
These codes are activated when you display the status
of a character on screen, either in game or on the
netherworld map. In Game, do not press Square on an
enemy, this will activate the code for this enemy and level him up.

Item Bits
000040 = Whistling Arrow (Normal) or Harpoon Of Thunder (Hard)
000100 = Cloak Of Force (Normal) or Sword Of The Sun (Hard)
000400 = Mask Of Strength (Normal) or Fruit Tree Map (Hard)
001000 = Lizard Detection Stone (Normal) or Shaman's Cloak (Hard)

010000 = Mask Of Power (Normal) or Shaman's Mask (Hard)
040000 = Cloak Of Deception (Normal) or Cloth Of Desperation (Hard)

With this code on, all random characters and the hero
will be wearing the same outfit and/or head. Pick'n'mix !
